title: League of Legends crashes on login screen

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I've looked around for fixes but none have worked. I've tried reinstalling Adobe Air, and also reinstalling League of Legends. Login screen simply stops responding when I click 'Launch' on the patcher. Any suggestions? I do not have LoL Replay installed.

https://i.gyazo.com/b9086aeadab32312019955b8eafd28bd.png

replies.body: This black screen is usually caused by an unstable connection that's failing to download assets.  It's likely that you'll experience other issues like trouble reaching our authentication servers or other hiccups.  Your best bet is to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to configure your network and make sure you can smoothly reach our servers.  Let me know if you have any questions!
